mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (category_seq, type_seq, title, contents) VALUES (#{categorySeq}, #{typeSeq}, #{title}, #{contents});
INSERT INTO posts (user_seq, category_seq, type_seq, title, contents) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{categorySeq}, #{typeSeq}, #{title}, #{contents});
INSERT INTO campaign_comments (user_seq, campaign_seq, comment_seq, comment) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{campaignSeq}, #{commentSeq}, #{comment})
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
UPDATE campaign_comments SET comment = #{comment} WHERE seq = #{seq} AND user_seq = #{userSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM posts WHERE seq = #{seq} AND user_seq = #{userSeq}
DELETE FROM campaign_comments WHERE seq = #{seq} AND user_seq = #{userSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT pc.category, p.title, p.contents, u_i.nickname, p.create_date as createDate, p.view_count as viewCount, CONCAT(u.id, '/', u.profile) as profile, p.type_seq as userType FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_seq = u.seq LEFT JOIN user_influencer u_i ON u.seq = u_i.user_seq LEFT JOIN post_categories pc on p.category_seq = pc.seq WHERE p.seq = #{seq} AND p.category_seq = #{type}

SELECT c.seq, c.user_seq as userSeq, uc.name, co.category, c.title, c.create_date as createDate, c.view_count as viewCount, uc.profile, uc.user_type as userType FROM communities c JOIN community_option co ON c.option_seq = co.seq AND co.type = #{type} JOIN user_community uc ON c.user_seq = uc.seq
AND c.title LIKE #{searchWord} AND uc.name LIKE #{searchWord} AND c.contents LIKE #{searchWord}
AND (c.title LIKE #{searchWord} OR uc.name LIKE #{searchWord} OR c.contents LIKE #{searchWord})
LIMIT #{page}, 10
